long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wordle Hint is an extension to narrow down possibility of words based on revealed alphabets.

How to use.

TLDR: Install -> Go to Wordle -> *Press "Enter on your physical keyboard"* -> Wait for the suggestion

After installation, you don't need to do anything more. Go to Wordle and just play. The extension will detect if you press a physical "Enter" button on your keyboard, then it will find a new possible set of words. The list of possible words are shown on the left side of a screen.

Please note that the extension uses a different dictionary. Some suggestion words might be not able to answer. In that case, please try another word in the suggestion list.

## Change logs

- 1.1.5: Support the nytime URL, fix the hint show even in hidden state when only one word left.
